overview.description: Alliance-wide cooperative PvE event where AI-controlled bandit waves attack all alliance members' cities and the Alliance Headquarters
overview.activation: R4/R5 alliance leaders schedule and activate

elite_waves.note: Reinforced player MUST be online or 0 points

hq_waves.note: Require coordinated reinforcement; highest-level HQ receives attacks

wave_structure.high_value_note: Waves 17-19 account for approximately 31% of all points

reasoning: Infantry engage first in turn-based combat — they secure kills before Lancers or Marksmen act
Points are based on kills — Infantry get the majority of kills
Crazy Joe's AI targets backline first — Marksmen are extremely vulnerable
With 0% Marksmen, Joe is forced into unfavorable frontline combat against Infantry wall

hq_wave_10_ratio.note: Offense-focused: Lancers have higher output frequency for kill contribution

hq_wave_20_ratio.note: Survival-focused: Infantry must tank to prevent frontline collapse

hero_strategy.note: Uses expedition skills (right side) because reinforcement is garrison-style defense combat

barricade_defense.slots_2_3: Strongest remaining heroes with defensive expedition skills

reinforcement_march.note: Only first hero's top-right expedition skill matters when reinforcing

recommended_heroes.name: Sergey
recommended_heroes.reason: Defenders' Edge -20% DMG taken at max level

scoring.own_city_defense: >=50% kill rate = MAX points (1,000 per wave)
scoring.reinforcement_scoring: 50% of reinforced player's score, divided by contribution
scoring.kill_percentage_scaling: Points scale linearly with % of attackers killed
scoring.city_owner_bonus: City owners earn max points regardless of whose troops killed, IF allies achieve 100% victory
scoring.two_strike_rule: If city fails to defend (<50% kills) TWICE, Joe stops attacking you
scoring.still_can_reinforce: After 2 failures you can still reinforce allies for points
scoring.event_end_condition: Only ends early if ALL alliance members fail twice

critical_rules.shields_do_not_work: Shield is completely ineffective during Crazy Joe
critical_rules.do_not_heal_during_event: Healed troops return to YOUR city, steal kills from allies reinforcing you
critical_rules.do_not_train_during_event: Newly trained troops appear in city and reduce allies' kill share
critical_rules.no_troop_death: Troops become wounded only — go to infirmary, no permanent loss
critical_rules.no_resource_loss: You do NOT lose resources when defeated

troop_recall_timing.after_wave_9: Recall best troops from allies, redirect to Alliance HQ for Wave 10
troop_recall_timing.after_wave_10: Recall from HQ immediately, redeploy to support allies
troop_recall_timing.after_wave_19: Recall and send to HQ for Wave 20

distribution.personal_ranking: Based on individual points vs all state players
distribution.alliance_ranking: Combined alliance score vs other alliances
distribution.delivery: Alliance rewards distributed at 10 UTC next day; based on alliance at delivery time, not participation time

rewards.f2p_importance: Primary F2P source for Chief Gear materials

advanced_strategies.zero_defense: Send ALL troops to reinforce allies, leaving own city empty. Sacrifice 2 strikes but earn reinforcement points. Requires trust and coordination.
advanced_strategies.alt_account: Send all troops out on alts and reinforce them with main to claim 100% kill points
advanced_strategies.difficulty_increase: Only increase difficulty when alliance achieves 80%+ success rate

difficulty_scaling.scaling: Enemy troop count increases ~10-13% per difficulty level
